Electrical Flux Simulator

Quadratic Drag Ball Simulation

This interactive simulation visualizes magnetic flux through a surface placed in a dynamic magnetic field. Adjust parameters like surface orientation, position, and magnetic field strength to explore how they affect the total flux through the surface. Watch the simulation respond in real-time and observe how vector field lines interact with geometry. The system also displays the relevant differential equations and integral formulations, including Gaussâ€™s Law for magnetism.
